trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Murrysville
There were no other sightings in Murrysville on or around December 7th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Red cigar-shaped with light floating above it.
divs: Sighting Details12 & 10 year kids were in back yard sled riding and object caught their eyes moving from north east to north west of us. They ran to the door screaming, I thought they were bleeding or something, they wanted me to see it, but it was out of sight (there are trees in way of where it traveled). Had them both draw pictures (attached). It was red, cigar shaped, with light on top in center, and another light that seemed to be floating above it. It had a row of brighter red small lights down the center also. There was no sound before or after. It was moving pretty fast high in the sky (faster than a plane at high altitude) and was about 4 inches long measured at arms length (kids arms). This is 4th UFO sighting in our family since June, 2008.
